title: sadAshivEna shankarENa
sahitya:
sadAshivEna shankarENa samrakSitOham hari brahmEndrAdi pUjitEna


anupallavi

 sadA cAra pravrttAtmakEna sanakAdi samshaya haraNEna shrI


caraNam   himAdri rAjAtmajA ramaNEna hiraNya kuNDalAlankrtEna 
hIna jAti kirAta pUjitEna hamsOllAsAnanda naTanEna 
kAmita phalada guruguhAtmajEna kalashOdbhava munibrnda nutEna 
sadyOjAtAdi panca mukhEna sindurAma kriyA rAganutEna
